posts.post_content:
I have for sale a group of Colorized Harpers Woodcuts. They are very well done and research shows that some work went into getting team colors right.
 THANK YOU FOR LOOKING THESE ARE NO LONGER AVAILABLE.  BUT ENJOY THE ARE GREAT.
10/15/1859  A Baseball match at the Elysian Fields 
8/22/1885 Buck Ewing Sliding Flint Catching  full page 
Thrown Out at Second large 2 pages 
1874 Boston Team 
New Grounds of the Metropolitan Stadium 1/2 page 
A game of baseball in the 13th Regiment
Those are great Jonathan, beautiful pieces, best of luck with the sale.
